name: Geometric-Battle
description:
It's a mini shooter where you face geometric shapes that bounce between each other and against the edges of the screen. This game is open source and licensed under the BSD-3 / CeCILL-B license.

This game was developed in C# with MonoGame and in only 3 days, I will update it and make additions to it if I have time and there is interest.

Game GitHub page: https://github.com/Bigfoot71/Geometric-Battle

Note: CeCILL-B is the equivalent of the BSD license valid for French law, it gives you so many freedoms ^^
